home.text: I'm passionate about Software Development 🖥️ and developing my skills in the field I specialize in. I consider myself responsible 📋, disciplined ⏰, and enthusiastic 😃. I enjoy working in a team 👥 and using those encounters to gain knowledge 🧠. I'm passionate about books on personal development 📚🧘‍♂️ and the Marvel Cinematic Universe 🦸‍♂️🎬. I'm ready to face new challenges! 💪
